thread.title: WATCH: Syracuse tops Duke at buzzer to keep NCAA Tournament hopes alive - CBSSports.com
thread.title_full: WATCH: Syracuse tops Duke at buzzer to keep NCAA Tournament hopes alive - CBSSports.com

author: Kyle Boone
title: WATCH: Syracuse tops Duke at buzzer to keep NCAA Tournament hopes alive - CBSSports.com
text:
19m ago â€¢ 1 min read 
With its back against the wall, Syracuse did exactly what it needed to do to get back in the NCAA Tournament conversation, taking down No. 10 Duke with a buzzer-beating 3-pointer. 
It was a back-and-forth game down the stretch, but star John Gillon banked in the winning shot to send Syracuse to a 78-75 victory. Add a comment
